patient_summary: The patient had some pain in their belly and their stool was a little bit bloody. The doctor did an exam of their stomach and found a polyp. The patient is going to need to take a medicine to help with their stomach. The doctor will give the patient more instructions later.

notes: The note mentions the patient had heme positive stool and chronic abdominal pain. The doctor performed an endoscopy and found a duodenal polyp and antral gastritis. The patient will need to take an H2 blocker. The note does not include the patient's name, age, gender, allergies, discharge location, or post-op instructions. The confidence level is low for some of the diagnoses and medications due to the limited information provided in the note. The patient tolerated the procedure well.
